```{r}

```

```{r}
library(stringi)

text = stri_trans_general(str = text, id = "Latin-ASCII")

punc <- gsub('[a-zA-Z0-9 ]', '', text)
punc <- punc[punc != ""]
punc <- data.frame(punc)
```

```{r}

mtcars
```

```{r, fig.height=8, fig.width=8}
x <- rep(1:174, 174)
y <- rep(174:1, each=174)

blank <- data.frame(rep(" ", 289))
colnames(blank) <- "punc"
punc <- rbind(punc, blank)

matrix <- as.tibble(cbind(x,y,punc))

matrix %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x,y, label = punc)) + 
  geom_text(size = 1.7) +  
  theme_void()+
  labs(caption = "test")
```
